item.title: Over hang of tree causing extensive damage, 13th October
item.description:
The over hang of tree that has not been cut back for many years, it's causing damage to cars and blocking up house drains from the leaves and sap of the tree. The tree has become a haven for vermin attracting rodents from the fallen debris.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Somerset Road, Goddington, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pavement blocked with a huge mess on Walworth road, 13th October
item.description:
Why we have to report to you mess on streets , what should be done as your job ???!!! Absolutly scandal ! Walworth road, Peckham Rye , ....all this streets look worst then 20 years ago ! Council does not renew it, everything there is old and damaged. Council Just left this main streets to get worst and worst . One Word = DISGUSTING!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 221, Walworth Road, Walworth, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Irish traveller dogs left unattending roaming around mabley green park causing nuisance and may um attacking other park users dogs and people. Irish travellers have set up camp on mabley green park public land and have two guard dogs a terrier and Jack Russell. Irish travellers are also urinating, pooing in the nearby facilities such as bushes and public areas., 13th October
item.description:
